name: The Citadel
summary: The Citadel is a first person shooter that fans of Doom, Marathon and Wolfenstein 3D cannot miss. Descend into the depth of a dark citadel and fight through 6 Episodes and 30 levels of action packed with 6 challenging bosses.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游玩人数: 1人
